column2: "... Thank you for creating my new Genesis. I hope it wasn't much trouble, Zieg."
"What are you talking about. Whenever you or Maria make a request, I already know the risks involved."
"Heh... That's for sure."
"It's been about 40 years since I last looked at your weapons. It brings me back..."

"40 years ago...
It's an unpleasant memory for me."
"Alma's... The original Claris Claes. You never forgot."
"The first sighting of White Tin Clarissa. The first ARKS in history. The strongest Technique user."
"That's all I know. I have never met her before. Only from stories."
"Her body was frail... I repeatedly asked her to lay low."
"Nevertheless, she was strong. So much to be able to seal [Elder]. So much to keep an eye on Luther."
"In exchange for safety and security of all ARKS, she sacrificed herself. There wasn't much time left..."
"I wanted to be her strength. So I became one of the three heroes, to support her."
"But I still regret... I did not concern myself enough... to stop and protect her."
"I couldn't even protect her. I was only able to discipline or obey."
"I could only defend the twisted order, born from her sacrifice."

"Regius...
That new Genesis I gave you.
Have I told you about the inscription?"

"Inscription?
Is it not \"World Ender\"?"
"You fool, why would I give my child, someone else's name? What kind of parent would do that?"
"Its inscription is \"World Creator.\" The name is exactly what it means."

"\"World Creator.\"
That inscription is too heavy for me."
"But you must shoulder it. If you have destroyed the world once, you simply need to create it again."
"If you can go that far, strengthen your heart, and be proud of Alma. Then you can recreate the world."
"As a weaponsmith, that gives me sustenance in continuing working."
"Well said..."
